articles.description: Upbeat tourists’ batters are in good nick, but their bowlers will need something better to work on if the series is to be won
articles.content: After England landed on Monday in idyllic Grenada, their seamers could have been forgiven for heading straight to the National Stadium and subtly sprinkling grass seed on the pitch in the way that An… [+4363 chars]

articles.title: Danny Ward emerges as favourite for the Leeds Rhinos job following Richard Agar's exit - Serious About Rugby League
articles.description: With the news that Richard Agar has stood down as Leeds Rhinos boss this morning, bookies have already been working out the odds for the next head coach. And, it may come as some surprise that former Rhinos prop Danny Ward – who only recently picked up a new …
